forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies this evening will give way to occasional snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear this evening then becoming mostly cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
